whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.intro: sNDa is the backronym for Solidarity Network for Development & Action
whoWeAre.pronunciation: Pronounced sun-dah (ÿ≥ŸÜÿØÿ©); in Sudanese slang it means a light snack, and in Arabic it means support. We bring both warmth and practical help.
whoWeAre.description: We‚Äôre a solidarity platform that blends grassroots care with a global vision. By combining human connection with smart technology, sNDa supports children in Sudan today and vulnerable communities worldwide tomorrow.

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.description: sNDa connects families, volunteers, coordinators and donors so help reaches those who need it faster. The platform focuses on rapid referrals, coordinated triage, secure case tracking, and clear donor impact.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Our web app makes it simple to move from referral to real impact. Each case starts with documented details, moves through clear steps, and progress is tracked and shared so the whole community can see the difference.

ourBackbone.title: Our backbone
ourBackbone.openSource: Open source, privacy-first, multilingual (Arabic/English at launch)
ourBackbone.tech: Technology: Django, Next.js, PostgreSQL, PyTorch for reliability and speed.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your information.

personal.item2: Contact information for volunteers and coordinators

case.item1: Information about children in need (with consent)

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.item1: To provide and maintain our platform services
use.item2: To connect volunteers with children in need
use.item4: To ensure platform security and prevent abuse
use.item5: To improve our services and user experience

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy and do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.
sharing.note: Information may be shared only in the following circumstances:
sharing.item2: To facilitate case management between authorized users
sharing.item3: When required by law or to protect rights and safety
sharing.item4: With trusted service providers who assist our operations

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.desc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security assessments.

children.title: 5. Children's Privacy
children.desc: We take special care to protect the privacy of children. Information about children is only collected with proper consent from parents or guardians, and is used solely for the purpose of providing assistance. We never knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental consent.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.item5: Export your data in a portable format
rights.item6: Lodge a complaint with supervisory authorities

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.desc: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. Case information may be retained longer for legal and safety purposes, but is anonymized when possible.

transfers.title: 8. International Transfers
transfers.desc: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.desc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our platform and updating the Last Updated date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at snda@hey.me

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The rules and responsibilities for using sNDa

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.desc: By accessing and using sNDa (Solidarity Network for Development and Aid), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.desc: sNDa is a platform that connects volunteers, coordinators, and donors to help children in need. Our service facilitates the submission, management, and resolution of cases involving children requiring assistance.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.item2: Respect the privacy and dignity of children and families
responsibilities.item4: Act in the best interest of children at all times
responsibilities.item5: Report any concerns or violations immediately

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.desc: We are committed to protecting the privacy of all users, especially children. All personal information is collected, used, and stored in accordance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Activities
prohibited.item2: Using the platform for commercial purposes without authorization
prohibited.item4: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the system
prohibited.item5: Violating any applicable laws or regulations

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.desc: sNDa provides this platform as a service to facilitate community support. We are not responsible for the actions of individual users or the outcomes of cases. Users participate at their own risk and discretion.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.desc: For questions about these terms, please contact us at snda@hey.me
